issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Secondary YARN builds started taking inordinately long and lots of tests started failing. Usually the secondary build would take ~ 2 hours. But recently even after 7 hours it wasn't done.
fields.summary: ant mapreduce tests are timing out

comments.body:
These are the tests that failed in those 7 hours

    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestCollect FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestComparators FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestFileOutputFormat FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestJavaSerialization FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestMapOutputType FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestMapRed FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TestMapCollection FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestLocalMRNotification FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.cli.TestMRCLI FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.fs.TestDFSIO FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.fs.TestFileSystem FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.fs.slive.TestSlive FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestFieldSelection FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestJobCounters FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestLineRecordReader FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestMRWithDistributedCache FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestReporter FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestUserDefinedCounters FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.jobcontrol.TestJobControl FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.jobcontrol.TestLocalJobControl FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.join.TestDatamerge FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.lib.TestChainMapReduce FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.lib.TestKeyFieldBasedComparator FAILED (timeout)
@Ravi, could you try out the patch. In addition to the fixes committed in MR-3158 and MR-3170, this patch should likely address the timeout issues in the listed tests.
@Ravi, forgot to mention that I still need to look at TestMRCLI and I believe I saw another jira around for TestDFSIO.
Thanks Hitesh! I applied your patch and ran TestFileSystem. It passed. I'll ask RE to apply the patch and run the secondary again.

Hi Hitesh! Change in plans. Could you please check this in so that we can trigger the secondary? Its definitely a step in the right direction.

+1 to the patch. Looks good.

P.S. : Could you please file a JIRA for the TODO in TestFileSystem?

I can also confirm that TestFileSystem is passing with the patch. Am currently running all the tests. That will take a while, can commit this once that passes.

But before that. Hitesh, there are TODOs that you added in TestFileSytem, you intending to fix them?

bq. But before that. Hitesh, there are TODOs that you added in TestFileSytem, you intending to fix them?

Thanks Vinod for verifying. Yes, I planned to look at the test failure and fix it hence had marked the patch as a work in progress. There was a fix done to the command parser earlier which seems to have broken this particular test.
TestMRCLI seems to be broken. Fixed the timeout issue in it for now but the tests fail. All other listed tests should be working now.
Okay, looks good. Let me submit this to Jenkins while I run the 'ant tests' in the background again with the latest patch.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12499474/MR-3176.1.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    +1 tests included.  The patch appears to include 46 new or modified tests.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    -1 findbugs.  The patch appears to introduce 161 new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    -1 core tests.  The patch failed these unit tests:
                  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TestJobMonitorAndPrint

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1051//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1051//artifact/trunk/hadoop-mapreduce-project/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-mapreduce-client-common.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1051//artifact/trunk/hadoop-mapreduce-project/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-mapreduce-client-app.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1051//artifact/trunk/hadoop-mapreduce-project/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-mapreduce-client-core.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1051//console

This message is automatically generated.

*sigh*

My local ant test run finished. Some more tests that are timing out:
  - org.apache.hadoop.examples.TestWordStats
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapred.lib.aggregate.TestAggregates
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.aggregate.TestMapReduceAggregates
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.db.TestDataDrivenDBInputFormat
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.db.TestDBJob
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.fieldsel.TestMRFieldSelection
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.join.TestJoinDatamerge
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TestLocalRunner   
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TestMapReduce
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TestValueIterReset                                         
  - org.apache.hadoop.record.TestRecordMR

Test failing because of the need for the framework name:
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TestNoJobSetupCleanup

Tests which are failing for unrelated issues but need fixing:
  - org.apache.hadoop.cli.TestMRCLI
  - org.apache.hadoop.conf.TestNoDefaultsJobConf
  - org.apache.hadoop.examples.terasort.TestTeraSort
  - org.apache.hadoop.ipc.TestSocketFactory
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestAuditLogger
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.security.TestTokenCache
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.security.token.delegation.TestDelegationToken
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestCombineOutputCollector
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestSubmitJob
  - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TestTaskContext

The secondary build passed yesterday but it took 5 hours. These were the tests which timed out.

    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.cli.TestMRCLI FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.fs.TestDFSIO FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapred.lib.aggregate.TestAggregates FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TestLocalRunner FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TestMapReduce FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TestValueIterReset FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.aggregate.TestMapReduceAggregates FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.db.TestDataDrivenDBInputFormat FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.fieldsel.TestMRFieldSelection FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.join.TestJoinDatamerge FAILED (timeout)
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.record.TestRecordMR FAILED (timeout)


They all fail with a large number of these lines above them 

bq. [junit] 2011-10-17 17:31:26,613 INFO  [communication thread] mapred.LocalJobRunner (LocalJobRunner.java:statusUpdate(489)) - reduce > copy


Another test timed out but didn't have this (reduce > copy) line.
    [junit] Test org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.db.TestDBJob FAILED (timeout)


@Vinod: TestWordStats did not run in my case. Also TestMRCLI timed out.
Oh! Vinod probably ran with MR-3176.1.patch , while I ran with MR-3176.wip.patch

bq. Oh! Vinod probably ran with MR-3176.1.patch , while I ran with MR-3176.wip.patch
Yes, I ran the tests with the patch.
Hitesh, please let me know if you need me/Ravi help with a share of the remaining tests for fixing. Thanks.

@Vinod, @Ravi - thanks for running the tests and helping in verifying the patch. 

However, I believe the current attached patch is wrong and the actual fix needs to be applied in ReduceTask as to how it detects whether the job is local or not. Trivial change to the code to now do the following: 

if framework not set and master address is local, assume local runner 
else if framework set and framework == local, assume local runner 
else not a local runner 

Running the tests locally at the moment - will send out an update once it completes.

Did not run the ant tests fully but this patch addresses all the timing out issues.

Addressed a couple of other failures in the other listed failed tests. 

Will open separate jiras for the other failure cases that are not related to the timing out issues.
@Daniel, could you give the latest patch a try to see if it addresses the timeouts in the pig tests.

The earlier patch wasn't exactly wrong, but the current one probably is the shorter route.

Patch looks good. Ran all the tests, no time-outs any more. There are failing tests (10-11), but we can track them separately.
Downgrading a couple of LOG messages to debug level.

MAPREDUCE-3209

I just committed this to trunk and branch-0.23. Thanks Hitesh!

Hitesh, can you create a separate ticket for the remaining tests? Ravi and I can put up the list of tests that are pending, and one of us can take it from there. Thanks.

    MAPREDUCE-3176. Fixed ant mapreduce tests that are timing out because of wrong framework name. Contributed by Hitesh Shah.
